courses.title: DesignBuilder Modeller
courses.description: The first module is the introduction to the DesignBuilder interface, with a focus on model geometry information input and drawing models.

courses.title: DesignBuilder Simulation
courses.description: This module focuses on running simulations and extracting data from DesignBuilder.

courses.title: Using DesignBuilder for SANS 10400 XA
courses.description: This day demonstrates how DesignBuilder is used to determine whether a house complies with the SANS 10400-XA standard by following the building energy modelling route.

courses.title: DesignBuilder HVAC
courses.description: This module demonstrates how DesignBuilder is used to model modern HVAC systems at the component detail level.

courses.title: DesignBuilder Advanced Modules
courses.description: This day looks at other powerful modules and calculation functionality within the software. The course is structured in such a way that the three most popular topics will be covered: (1) CFD (2) Natural Ventilation and (3) Thermal Comfort.
